alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 8:55PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL KANDIYOHI COUNTY THROUGH 930 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willmar, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Willmar, New London, Spicer, and Green Lake. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 near mile marker 75. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 124 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
